pages.text: The Teleporter is a machine that uses ELs to teleport entities (mobs and players) far away.$(br)You can activate the 'auto-deletion' option that will remove the linked coordinates from the teleporter after you use it.
Needed ingredients :$(br)- 3 Compressed Obsidians$(br)- 2 Steel Plates$(br)- 2 Electronic Circuits$(br)- 1 Machine Casing
